{{Wireless embedded system |brand=SmartRG |model=SR505n |revision=v1 |asin= |manuf_country=China |manuf=DareGlobal |manuf_model= |availability=now |est_release_date= |fcc_date=12/14/2012 |fcc_id=VW7SR505N |pcb_id= |type=wireless router, dsl modem |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM63168 |cpu1_cspeed=400 |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model=S25FL128S |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=H5TQ1G63DFR-H9C |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM63168 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports= |flags=VDSL2, ADSL2+ |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=00:23:6A, 80:A1:D7 |oui_eth=00:23:6A, 80:A1:D7 }} {{TagLine|802.11n VDSL2 Gateway}} :[https://supportcommunity.adtran.com/t5/SR505n-Gateway/tkb-p/SR505n Product page]{{â€¢}}[https://www.smartrg.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/09/SR505n.pdf PBrief]
*[https://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20181206005431/en/ADTRAN-Acquires-SmartRG%E2%80%94Leading-Provider-of-Connected-Home-Software-Platforms-Cloud-Services SmartRG acquired by Adtran] {{See also|Adtran|SmartRG}} "PWB: T003PW0001C-G" and "DAT: 2012.04.23" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :OEM: [[DareGlobal]] (''Shanghai DareGlobal Technologies Co.,Ltd.'') A sticker with "MAC: 80A1D72215C3 T003G-V33" and "LS T0036219A-G B31-JX-001 20120629" :is also affixed to the board in the internal photos.
The FCC manual notes the board ID as '''STV504W''' in the HTTP interface screenshots. :The OUI used in this entry (00:23:6A) is per a marketplace (eBay) label.
